channel.title: metal on Loud Legends
channel.description: Recent content in metal on Loud Legends

item.title: Shavo Odadjian’s Seven Hours After Violet Drops New Single "Cry"; VIDEO
item.description: Seven Hours After Violet, led by Shavo Odadjian, releases the music video for their single “Cry.

item.title: James Hetfield: "We Don’t Want to Be a Legacy Band That Only Plays Hits"
item.description: James Hetfield states Metallica doesn’t want to become a “legacy band” that only plays greatest hits.

item.title: Slipknot and Estate of Joey Jordison Settle Lawsuit Quietly
item.description: Settlement Reached: Joey Jordison’s estate and Slipknot have settled a lawsuit, with terms undisclosed.
